schema.name: about_page
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "about_page" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL DEFAULT null, `status` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft', `created_by` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `created_on` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `updated_by` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `updated_on` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `meta_title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `meta_description` text NULL DEFAULT null, `intro_text` text NULL DEFAULT null, `podcast_crew_heading` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `behind_the_scenes_heading` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `cover_image` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT `about_page_created_by_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`created_by`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `about_page_updated_by_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`updated_by`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `about_page_cover_image_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`cover_image`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)
